features: REVIVE DRY HAIR: TRESemmé Rich Moisture Shampoo and Conditioner hair care for dry hair delivers optimized hydration that targets dryness and locks in moisture where your hair needs it most
ENRICHED WITH VITAMIN E: This gentle shampoo and conditioner system's advanced formula with vitamin E delivers optimum hydration for parched hair that targets dryness and seals in moisture
SOFT, HEALTHY-FEELING HAIR: This hydrating shampoo and conditioner system delivers 7x more moisture, versus regular shampoos and conditioners, leaving your hair feeling soft, beautiful, and healthy
TREND LED, RIGOROUSLY TESTED: Every ingredient is carefully selected to ensure your hair receives the best possible care. We do not test on animals and our hair products are PETA-approved
HAIR CARE TIPS FROM OUR STYLISTS: Use both TRESemmé Rich Moisture Shampoo and TRESemmé Rich Moisture Conditioner to achieve touchably soft hair that’s still full of natural movement
DO IT WITH YOUR STYLE: With professional quality hair products, like our Rich Moisture Shampoo and Conditioner, you can create your personal style to achieve your aspirations with confidence
body.description: There's something about silky hair that's full of natural movement that lets you take on the day with confidence. You can now get that style without having to go to a salon with TRESemmé Rich Moisture Shampoo and Conditioner for dry hair. The hydrating shampoo and conditioner are designed to deliver intense hydration to dry strands, leaving your hair with a beautiful, healthy, salon-worthy shine. The end result? Gorgeously silky hair that lasts and lasts. These TRESemmé shampoos and conditioners are free from Parabens, Mineral Oils, Dyes, and DMDM Hydantoin. How to use the Rich Moisture System: Step 1: Apply the shampoo to wet hair liberally and gently massage the scalp and roots with fingertips. Step 2: Lightly squeeze the shampoo from roots to ends and rinse thoroughly. Step 3: Repeat steps 1 and 2 with the conditioner. Step 4: Finish and style with your favorite TRESemmé products. We've always understood that style is more than a look: it's a part of you. With our professional quality care, a world of style possibilities is yours to achieve.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Salon stylists know great style starts with the right wash and care foundation. TRESemmé Pro Style Technology, with amino acids and ceramide, works from the inside out and leaves hair strong and manageable*. Make your hair the perfect style canvas. *with continued use.

LUXURIOUS SOFTNESS & SHINE Our Rich Moisture System, with Hyaluronic Plex, nourishes strands, leaving them feeling hydrated, soft and with a healthy-looking shine. STRONG STRANDS READY FOR ANY STYLE These salon-level formulas, with Pro Style Technology, leave hair strong and effortlessly manageable so you have the perfect base to create any style. TRUSTED INGREDIENTS This collection is PETA-approved cruelty-free and has 0% parabens, mineral oil and DMDM Hydantoin. PROFESSIONAL, SALON-QUALITY EVERY TIME TRESemmé is dedicated to creating professional-quality, trend-inspired products that care for your hair and help you style it however you want. So you can do it with style.

TRESemmé Rich Moisture Conditioner, 28 oz TRESemmé Silky & Smooth Shampoo, 28 oz TRESemmé Silky & Smooth Conditioner, 28 oz Main Benefit Looking for soft, shiny strands? The TRESemmé Rich Moisture Conditioner, with Hyaluronic Plex, pairs with its shampoo to nourish strands, leaving them feeling hydrated, soft and with a healthy-looking shine. Say hello to 48hours of frizz control and shine with the TRESemmé Silky&Smooth collection. Made with Argan OleoBlend, this shampoo, when paired with its conditioner intensely moisturizes and tames frizz and flyaways leaving hair silky soft and smooth Tame frizz and boost your hair’s shine for 48hours with the TRESemmé Silky&Smooth Collection. Made with Argan OleoBlend, this conditioner pairs with its shampoo to intensely moisturize taming frizz and flyaways to leave hair silky soft and smooth.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Very good value, lasts long, and is not harmful to your hair. My friend visited me and used this shampoo, and I heard compliments about the product a lot. People ask me which brand I use when they smell my hair.

reviews.reviewText: Much easier than going to the store and hoping these are on sale or getting sold together! Skip the fret and get these. Makes my life easier and generally cheaper than what you find in the store.
